## Class `ModeKeys`

Standard names for model modes (deprecated).



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->

THIS CLASS IS DEPRECATED.

The following standard keys are defined:

* `TRAIN`: training mode.
* `EVAL`: evaluation mode.
* `INFER`: inference mode.
